titles: Proclamation for apprehending five persons declared fugitives, by the Commission of Justiciary for the Highlands.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the third day of August, and of Our Reign the ninth year, 1697.

keywords: Fugitives from justice --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
